abstract: Survey published in journal JAMA Dermatology finds prices for 19 brand-name dermatology drugs have quintupled since 2009, with two Valeant Pharmaceuticals drugs increasing by 1,700 percent; observes that increases are unprecedented and are not due to drugs being new or exotic.
lead_paragraph: The study found that prices for 19 brand-name dermatology drugs increased about 400 percent in the last six years, but two of Valeant’s increases were the biggest.

headline.main: 2 Valeant Dermatology Drugs Lead Steep Price Increases, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Skin Drugs Lead Way in Price Rise, Study Says

snippet: The study found that prices for 19 brand-name dermatology drugs increased about 400 percent in the last six years, but two of Valeant’s increases were the biggest.
